examples: The development of self-driving cars acts as a quantum jump in transportation, with the potential to reduce traffic and improve safety on the roads.
Europe has a well-developed transportation system.
When planning a trip, I always try to remember the saying 'beware of little expenses' and factor in all the smaller costs like transportation and food, as they can add up quickly.
Transportation broke down.
Transportation lock, remove first.
words.defineEn: a system or method for carrying people or goods from one place to another by cars, trains, etc.
words.defineVi: một hệ thống hoặc phương pháp vận chuyển người hoặc hàng hóa từ nơi này đến nơi khác bằng ô tô, tàu hỏa, v.v.

examples: Lots of couples have problems in the first year of marriage.
The problem has now reached crisis point.
The problem was always at the back of my mind.
There are problems.
The problem is all in his head.
words.defineEn: something that causes difficulties and is hard to overcome
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó gây ra khó khăn và khó vượt qua

examples: Accidents like this happen all the time.
That accident battered up the door of my car.
She'll have an accident one day.
The latest skiing accident is a case in point.
Both drivers shared the blame for the accident.
words.defineEn: an unexpected and unpleasant event that occurs by chance, usually causing damage or injury
words.defineVi: một sự kiện bất ngờ và khó chịu xảy ra một cách tình cờ, thường gây ra thiệt hại hoặc thương tích

examples: The pilot made every safety check before taking off, but an unexpected mechanical issue caused a delay.
By the end of the day many of the drivers were running on fumes or had experienced mechanical problems.
About 1,000 years ago, an Arab engineer added mechanical features to water clocks.
About 1,000 years ago, an Arab engineer added mechanical features to water clocks.
Piezoelectric materials turn mechanical stress, like pressure, sound waves, and other vibrations into electricity and vice versa.
words.defineEn: describing an object that is operated by machinery or engine power
words.defineVi: mô tả một đối tượng được vận hành bởi máy móc hoặc sức mạnh động cơ

examples: He never missed a televised basketball or football game.
I missed the part where that's my problem.
but we missed them.
She received a missed call from an unknown phone number.
You've missed your mark three times in a row.
words.defineEn: to fail to catch a bus, airplane, etc.
words.defineVi: không bắt được xe buýt, máy bay, v.v.

examples: The train’s here at long last.
The train traveled through beautiful countryside.
Trains between London and Brighton run throughout the day.
To hold the train.
The slow train arrived at the station behind schedule.
words.defineEn: a series of connected carriages or wagons pulled along a railroad line by a locomotive
words.defineVi: một loạt các toa xe hoặc toa xe được kết nối với nhau do đầu máy kéo dọc theo một tuyến đường sắt

examples: The vision seems a flight of fancy.
He found a cheap flight deal for his vacation.
I need to book a flight to New York for next week's business meeting.
Jimmy often has good ideas but his latest proposal is just a flight of fancy!
We had a great trip, but our flight home was badly delayed, which took the gilt off the gingerbread.
words.defineEn: the act of traveling in an airplane
words.defineVi: hành động đi du lịch trên máy bay

examples: Despite his efforts to hide it, John felt seasick on the boat and seemed green about the gills.
I was seasick as a dog, just throwing up and retching and "Get me off!"
Chuck was seasick the entire five years.
Well I was never seasick again, strange enough.
It’s enough to make anyone seasick!
words.defineEn: feeling sick or nauseous due to the motion of the ship or boat one is traveling with
words.defineVi: cảm thấy buồn nôn hoặc buồn nôn do chuyển động của tàu hoặc thuyền mà người đó đang đi cùng

examples: He gets carsick!
He’s a little worried about our road trip since he gets motion sickness, but if you get carsick, there are some things you can do to feel better!
words.defineEn: feeling sick because of the motions experienced while traveling in a car
words.defineVi: cảm thấy buồn nôn vì những chuyển động trải qua khi đi trên ô tô

examples: It's kinda like being airsick or seasick.
I don't like to not be the one flying because I get fairly airsick when somebody else is flying.
The stewardesses doubled as registered nurses who passed out snacks while also helping passengers who became airsick.
words.defineEn: feeling nauseous and sick when on a moving aircraft
words.defineVi: cảm thấy buồn nôn và ốm yếu khi ở trên máy bay đang di chuyển
